trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of Windows claims that are associated with an entity.
trans-unit.target: 表示與實體相關聯之 Windows 宣告的集合。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.WindowsClaimSet"></xref> class by using the Windows user identity specified by the <xref href="System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.WindowsClaimSet"></xref>類別使用的 Windows 使用者識別所指定<xref href="System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The claims representing the Windows groups to which this user belongs are added to the claim set.
trans-unit.target: 表示使用者所屬 Windows 群組的宣告會加入至宣告集。

trans-unit.source: The expiration time is set to 10 hours.
trans-unit.target: 到期時間設定為 10 小時。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity"></xref> that specifies the Windows identity.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity"> </xref>指定 Windows 身分識別。

trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若包含表示此使用者所屬; 之 Windows 群組的宣告否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>包含 Windows 使用者所屬的群組;否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The authentication type for the Windows Identity.
trans-unit.target: Windows 身分識別驗證類型。

trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.DateTime>指定宣告集的到期時間。</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of claims in this collection.
trans-unit.target: 在此集合中取得宣告的數。

trans-unit.source: The number of claims in this collection.
trans-unit.target: 此集合中的宣告數。

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.WindowsClaimSet"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 所使用的資源全部釋出<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.WindowsClaimSet"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Call the Dispose method when you are finished using the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.WindowsClaimSet>.
trans-unit.target: 當您完成使用<xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.WindowsClaimSet>.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.WindowsClaimSet>呼叫 Dispose 方法

trans-unit.source: The Dispose method leaves the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.WindowsClaimSet> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: Dispose 方法會使<xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.WindowsClaimSet>中無法使用的狀態。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.WindowsClaimSet>

trans-unit.source: After calling the Dispose method, you must release all references to the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.WindowsClaimSet> so that the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.WindowsClaimSet> occupied.
trans-unit.target: 在呼叫 Dispose 方法之後，您必須釋放所有參考<xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.WindowsClaimSet>，讓記憶體回收行程可以回收的記憶體，<xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.WindowsClaimSet>佔用。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.WindowsClaimSet> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.WindowsClaimSet>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)和[實作 Dispose 方法](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Always call the Dispose method before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.WindowsClaimSet>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 在發行您的最後一個參考至<xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.WindowsClaimSet>。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.WindowsClaimSet>前請務必呼叫 Dispose 方法

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using are not freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.WindowsClaimSet> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: 否則，它所使用的資源不會釋放直到記憶體回收行程呼叫<xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.WindowsClaimSet>物件的`Finalize`方法。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.WindowsClaimSet>

trans-unit.source: Gets the expiration time for this <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.WindowsClaimSet"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個到期時間<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.WindowsClaimSet"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DateTime> in which this <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.WindowsClaimSet"></xref> expires.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime>這個<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.WindowsClaimSet"></xref>到期。</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: Searches for the claim that matches the specified claim type and rights in the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.WindowsClaimSet"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 搜尋符合指定的宣告類型和權限的宣告<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.WindowsClaimSet"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Use the properties of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimTypes> class to specify the `claimType` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 使用的屬性<xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimTypes>類別，以指定`claimType`參數。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimTypes>

trans-unit.source: The uniform resource identifier (URI) of a claim type.
trans-unit.target: 宣告型別統一資源識別元 (URI)。

trans-unit.source: The URI of the right associated with the new claim.
trans-unit.target: 與新宣告相關聯的權限的 URI。

trans-unit.source: A<xref uid="langword_csharp_ System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<Claim>" name=" System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<Claim>" href=""></xref> object that enables you to enumerate the claims that match the specified criteria.
trans-unit.target: A<xref uid="langword_csharp_ System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<Claim>" name=" System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<Claim>" href=""> </xref>物件，可讓您列舉符合指定的準則的宣告。

trans-unit.source: Gets an <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerator%601> that can be used to enumerate the Windows claims in the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.WindowsClaimSet"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerator%601> ，可以用來列舉中的 Windows 宣告<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.WindowsClaimSet"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerator%601> that can be used to enumerate the Windows claims in the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.WindowsClaimSet"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <Xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerator%601> ，可以用來列舉中的 Windows 宣告<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.WindowsClaimSet"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the issuer for this <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.WindowsClaimSet"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個簽發者<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.WindowsClaimSet"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The issuer for a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.WindowsClaimSet> is <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimSet.Windows%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如<xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.WindowsClaimSet>為<xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimSet.Windows%2A>。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimSet.Windows%2A></xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.WindowsClaimSet>簽發者

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimSet"></xref> that represents the issuer of this claim set.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimSet"> </xref>表示此宣告集的簽發者。

trans-unit.source: Gets the claim for the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 取得指定索引的宣告。

trans-unit.source: The index of the Windows claim to be retrieved.
trans-unit.target: 要擷取之 Windows 宣告的索引。

trans-unit.source: The claim for the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 指定索引的宣告。

trans-unit.source: Returns this <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.WindowsClaimSet"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回此<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.WindowsClaimSet"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: This <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.WindowsClaimSet"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 這<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.WindowsClaimSet"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the Windows identity for this claim set.
trans-unit.target: 取得此宣告集中的 Windows 身分識別。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity"></xref> for this claim set.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity"> </xref>此宣告集。
